code: export var getHexOrDont=function getHexOrDont(string){return string;};export var getJsonOrDont=function getJsonOrDont(string){var json;try{json=JSON.parse(string);}catch(e){json={};}return json;};export var getNumberOrDont=function getNumberOrDont(string){var number;try{number=parseInt(string,10);if(isNaN(number)){throw new Error('not a number');}}catch(e){number=null;}return number;};export default{getHexOrDont:getHexOrDont,getJsonOrDont:getJsonOrDont,getNumberOrDont:getNumberOrDont};
